Message:
When I think about it,
it’s all my fault that
everything got so messy.

If I could paint it in
a prettier picture,

it’s like baking a cake,
accidentally knocking it over,
then having to clean up the mess.

I tried so hard to make
the yummiest cake I could,
but the way it all ended up...

After that, I decided to
go see what kinds of cakes
other people were baking.

But it turns out
everyone was like me—

knocking their cakes over
and burning everything
to the ground.

This place is a wonderful cake,
baked with love and care.
